headline: 3 Top Energy Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Energy stocks as a whole delivered an underwhelming performance in 2025.  The average one in the S&P 500 has only managed to eke out a small gain (the Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund -- an ETF that tracks energy stocks in the S&P 500 -- is only up about 1% on the year).  A few Fool.com contributors expect a better performance from energy stocks next year.
